H0.text: where was the city of david. Hebron

H1.text: where was the city of david. Jericho

H2.text: where was the city of david. Samaria

H3.text: where was the city of david. Bethlehem

A4.text: The New Testament describes it as the 'City of David'.

A5.text: In the Hebrew Bible, the period of the Israelites is described; it identifies Bethlehem as the birthplace of David.
